aboutpara: Senior Computer Science student currently working in backend development. Enthusiastic about algorithmic logic and dedicated to optimizing system performance. Passionate about AI and the endless possibilities it brings. Driven by code, fueled by curiosity, and always eager to tackle the next challenge. ðŸ’¡ðŸ’»

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a student, software engineer, and backend developer.
resume.description: Aiming to deliver quality code in the most flexible way possible. Well-versed with Python, JavaScript, Java, C++ and several Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Designing developing and implementing backend code using Python, Designing optimal data for the backend and database and code with a no-SQL database, Collaborating with the frontend team to integrate backend and frontend code, Performing unit testing and integration testing  to ensure the code is bug-free,  Writing detailed documentation for the code to ensure it is understandable and maintainable, Taking part in cross-team meetings (UI/UX designers, front-end and back-end developers) to discuss and brainstorm software requirements and flows.

Technical Assistance: Aided around 5 students per section with their programming problems in basic and advanced programming lab sessions, Classroom Coordination: Acquired crucial leadership and communication abilities while also enhancing collaborative capabilities- specifically in technical applications, Covered Courses: Assisted in Introduction to Programming in Java (CSIS285)- Data Structures and Algorithms in C++ (CSIS287)- Introduction to Programming for Mechatronics Students in C++ (CSIS206).

Professional Environment Exposure: Successfully adapted to and collaborated within professional settings strengthening teamwork and communication skills, Python & Django Proficiency: Demonstrated hands-on implementation in Python and Django deepening understanding of both frameworks for backend development, Thorough Python Understanding: Developed a comprehensive grasp of Python language applied to develop robust backend solutions,  Introduction to Web-sockets: Acquired familiarity with web-sockets gaining insights into real-time communication protocols for modern web development

education.universityPara: B.S. in Computer Science with cumulative average of 88.4. Covering a wide range of courses including Object-oriented Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms, Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, Networking and Communication, Game Development, Mobile Development, and Mathematics
